sentence.Network_en: Many countries have no laws governing the collation of personal information.
sentence.Network_cn: 很多国家没有针对个人信息收集的法律。

sentence.Network_en: It was in this choice retreat that Mr. Quilp ordered a cold collation to be prepared.
sentence.Network_cn: 奎尔普先生就是在这个精美的别墅里预定冷点的.

sentence.Network_en: I was quite taken with your line of photocopiers with collation and stapling capability.
sentence.Network_cn: 我被贵公司能够自动整理和装订的系列复印机吸引住了.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 校对(collation)选项是用来决定数据库排序的方式。在一些使用特殊符号的语言，例如德国的变音(umlaut)，数据库的定序决定排列次序。
摘要: 什么是排序规则（collation） 关于SQL Server的排序规则，估计大家都不陌生，在创建数据库时我们经常要选择一种排序规则（…
MySQL字符集问题MySQL字符集介绍MySQL的字符集支持(Character Set Support)有两个方面：字符集(Character set)和排序方式(Co…

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: via Old French from Latin collatio(n-), from conferre (see confer). Originally (in the plural) the term denoted John Cassian's Collationes Patrum in Scetica Eremo Commorantium 'Conferences of, or with, the Egyptian Hermits' (ad 415–20), from which a reading would be given in Benedictine communities prior to a light meal (see sense 2)

entry.def: When you collate pieces of information, you gather them all together and examine them.

example.ex: Roberts has spent much of his working life collating the data on which the study was based...
example.tran: 罗伯茨的很大一部分工作时间都是在核对研究所需的数据。

example.ex: They have begun to collate their own statistics on racial abuse.
example.tran: 他们已经开始整理自己有关种族歧视的统计数据。

means.word_mean: 2. assembling in proper numerical or logical sequence
3. careful examination and comparison to note points of disagreement

auth_sentence.content: Mann's results were flawed due to collation errors, unjustifiable truncation, obsolete data and geographical location errors.

stems_affixes.word_buile: elate[v.使兴高采烈,使得意]+ion表名词→n.得意,振奋
cor共同+relate发生关系→使相互关联
e出+late拿出,带出,放→拿出情绪→高兴

stems_affixes.value_cn: 叙述, 讲, 使联系, 发生关系
stems_affixes.word_buile: re回+late拿出,带出,放→回放→叙述, 讲
sub在下面+late拿出,带出,放→放到下面→否定,消除
trans变换+late拿出,带出,放→交换拿出→翻译
